body_html: I use bazel build -c opt --local_resources 1024,4.0,1.0 --jobs 4 --verbose_failures --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package and without allocate swap to build tensorflow r.09 on the TX1 JetPack 2.3 that pass compilation.
body_text: I use bazel build -c opt --local_resources 1024,4.0,1.0 --jobs 4 --verbose_failures --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package  and without allocate swap to build tensorflow r.09 on the TX1 JetPack 2.3 that pass compilation.
body: I use ``` bazel build -c opt --local_resources 1024,4.0,1.0 --jobs 4 --verbose_failures --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package ```  and without allocate swap to build tensorflow r.09 on the TX1 JetPack 2.3 that pass compilation.
